verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329> upon<WH5921> Gittith,<WH1665> A Psalm<WH4210> for the sons<WH1121> of Korah.<WH7141> How<WH4100> amiable<WH3039> are thy tabernacles,<WH4908> O LORD<WH3068> of hosts!<WH6635>

My soul<WH5315> longeth,<WH3700> yea even<WH1571> fainteth<WH3615> for the courts<WH2691> of the LORD:<WH3068> my heart<WH3820> and my flesh<WH1320> crieth out<WH7442> for<WH413> the living<WH2416> God.<WH410>

Yea, <WH1571> the sparrow<WH6833> hath found<WH4672> a house,<WH1004> and the swallow<WH1866> a nest<WH7064> for herself, where<WH834> she may lay<WH7896> her young,<WH667> even<WH853> thine altars,<WH4196> O LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> my King,<WH4428> and my God.<WH430>
Blessed <WH835> are they that dwell<WH3427> in thy house:<WH1004> they will be still<WH5750> praising<WH1984> thee. Selah.<WH5542>
Blessed <WH835> is the man<WH120> whose strength<WH5797> is in thee; in whose heart<WH3824> are the ways<WH4546> of them.
Who passing<WH5674> through the valley<WH6010> of Baca<WH1056> make<WH7896> it a well;<WH4599> the rain<WH4175> also<WH1571> filleth<WH5844> the pools.<WH1293>
They go<WH1980> from strength<WH4480> <WH2428> to<WH413> strength,<WH2428> every one of them in Zion<WH6726> appeareth<WH7200> before<WH413> God.<WH430>
O LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of hosts,<WH6635> hear<WH8085> my prayer:<WH8605> give ear,<WH238> O God<WH430> of Jacob.<WH3290> Selah.<WH5542>
Behold, <WH7200> O God<WH430> our shield,<WH4043> and look upon<WH5027> the face<WH6440> of thine anointed.<WH4899>

For <WH3588> a day<WH3117> in thy courts<WH2691> is better<WH2896> than a thousand.<WH4480> <WH505> I had rather<WH977> be a doorkeeper<WH5605> in the house<WH1004> of my God,<WH430> than to dwell<WH4480> <WH1752> in the tents<WH168> of wickedness.<WH7562>

For <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> is a sun<WH8121> and shield:<WH4043> the LORD<WH3068> will give<WH5414> grace<WH2580> and glory:<WH3519> no<WH3808> good<WH2896> thing will he withhold<WH4513> from them that walk<WH1980> uprightly.<WH8549>
O LORD<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> blessed<WH835> is the man<WH120> that trusteth<WH982> in thee.
